Sentencas: Power transformer is vital for energy conversion in power system, the condition assessment of which based on dissolved gas analysis (DGA) is used worldwide.
Titulo: Power transformer condition assessment based on online monitor with SOFC chromatographic detector

Sentencas: In this paper, an online monitor based on solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) detector is designed to address the poor stability, low sensitivity of other online-monitoring system.
Titulo: Power transformer condition assessment based on online monitor with SOFC chromatographic detector

Sentencas: The system is composed of a gas measurement subsystem, a central controlling unit, and an intelligent fault diagnosis subsystem.
Titulo: Power transformer condition assessment based on online monitor with SOFC chromatographic detector

Sentencas: A portable gas chromatography module developed using SOFC detector.
Titulo: Power transformer condition assessment based on online monitor with SOFC chromatographic detector

Sentencas: The quantificational algorithm is derived, on basis of which calibration can be skipped.
Titulo: Power transformer condition assessment based on online monitor with SOFC chromatographic detector

Sentencas: Due to the essential role of the chromatography column as well as gas the detector's temperature, proportional-integral-differential (PID) controller is implemented in the controlling unit.
Titulo: Power transformer condition assessment based on online monitor with SOFC chromatographic detector

Sentencas: To evaluate the effectiveness of the developed online monitor, the quantitative analysis and engineering application have been performed; then, based on the measured results, the RVM-ANFIS algorithm is adopted to diagnosis the latent transformers faults.
Titulo: Power transformer condition assessment based on online monitor with SOFC chromatographic detector

Sentencas: Using the developed online monitor, the results indicate that five characteristic gases, H-2, CH4, C2H4, C2H6, and C2H2 can be measured accurately, and incipient faults can be detected, validate the effectiveness of this system.
Titulo: Power transformer condition assessment based on online monitor with SOFC chromatographic detector
